para.text: After running PEST, you can import the modified model into ModelMuse and visual the modified hydraulic conductivity distribution and pumping rate.
In the modified model the combined estimated pumping rates of the two wells making up the seepage pond is 0.168 m
/s which is less than the actual pumping rate of 0.025 m
A diagram of the estimated distribution of Kx is shown below.

image.title: Diagram displaying the estimated distribution of Kx.
image.caption: Diagram displaying the estimated distribution of Kx.

para.text: The true distribution from the model used to generate the observed values for the parameter estimation exercise is shown below.

image.title: Diagram displaying the true distribution of Kx.
image.caption: Diagram displaying the true distribution of Kx.

para.text: The true hydraulic conductivity distribution has lower hydraulic conductivities than any of the estimated hydraulic conductivities. The highest estimated hydraulic conductivity is higher than any of the true hydraulic conductivities.
